title: U.S. sweet potato production 2000 to 2018
summary: Overall Production in thousand cwt has increased over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Production in thousand cwt, of value 31016.0 was reached at Year 2015
The lowest Production in thousand cwt, of value 12799.0 was reported at Year 2002
min_summary: In general Production in thousand cwt has rose over the Year.
